subject: Big Brown (Race Horse)
Horse Racing
Belmont Stakes
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Preakness Stakes
Kentucky Derby
lead_paragraph: Many expect Casino Drive, a chestnut colt, to be a formidable obstacle on Big Brown’s path to becoming thoroughbred racing’s 12th Triple Crown champion.
snippet: Many expect Casino Drive, a chestnut colt, to be a formidable obstacle on Big Brown’s path to becoming thoroughbred racing’s 12th Triple Crown champion.
